name: PulmonaryEmbolismComplicationsRelatedToHipAndKneeProcedures
title: Pulmonary Embolism Complications Related To Hip and Knee Procedures
description: This set of values contains Pulmonary Embolism complications related to hip and knee procedures.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains Pulmonary Embolism complications related to hip and knee procedures.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Diagnosis category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include pulmonary embolism complications related to hip and knee procedures.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
